Posts.Content: Hi ladies on Tuesday I had breast reduction done due to reapeat infections and cellulitis in my right breast,they also,took all my nipple ducts and aereola,today I went to have the dressing off ect and the nipple reconstruction didn't take,it's black rotted and smells like nothing I have ever smelt before it's horrid,going back to see surgeon tomorrow to see what he wants to do,anyone else had this?xxx
Posts.Title: Hello,failed nipple reconstruction

Posts.Content: Thank you mistey,I had the nipple reconstructed from my own tissue as fair as I know,will find out more tomorrow I guess,I'd rather not have another nipple recon but to go for the tatto at a later date sounds a good idea xx
Posts.Title: Hello,failed nipple reconstruction

Posts.Content: My surgeon today removed the dead nipple and has sent me home with 2 pumps vac things to help heal where I have wound leakages so much happier and don't smell of rotting fleshÂ
